column2: caption="Gorkil" from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]''

column1: '''Gorkil the Goblin King''' is a hero created for [[Electronic Arts
column2: EA]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' in the "Goblins" faction. He appears zipping around on top of a large Scorpion. He is voiced by [[Dave Wittenberg]].

column1: *Skull Totem - Places a skull totem which will remain on the map until *destroyed. Reveals the nearby shroud and detects stealth.
*Battle Frenzy - Targeted units gain +50% Damage, +50% Armor, and earn experience twice as fast.
*Poisoned Stinger - Targeted enemy becomes stunned and takes poison damage over time.
*Call from the Deep - Summons three Fire Drakes under the caster's control
[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]
